content: Moonnaam shushroosha
Praarambhapraarththhana

Karunayulllla daivamaaya kartthaave! Ninnil nyangall sharanappedunnu. Ninte karthrkalpanayaal verpettupoya ee daasiyude aathmaavinuvendi ninnodu nyangall apekshikkunnu. Kartthaave! Dushdanmaaraaya mathsarakkaarude valakallilninnum kaanappedaattha andhakaara sainyangallilninnum ivalle veendukollllaname. Ee aathmaavu jeevante sthhaanatthu neethimaanmaarude koottatthil chennu etthumaaraakaname. Pithaavum puthranum parishuddharoohaayum aayullllove! Ippozhum ellaayppozhum ennekkum ivall ninte parishuddhanmaarodukoode vasikkumaaraakaname. Hosho..
(kukkiliyon ezhaam niram)

Nee jeevaneduttheedumpoll-haale... U haa...
Mrtharaayu mannil-cherunnu.

Kartthyamahatthvam vaazhattennum haale...U haa...
Than kriyakalliludayon-thelliyatte.
Baarekmor. Shubaho… menaolam…
(ekkbo)

Priyanaam laasarine kabaree-
Nnezhunnelppichone vaazhtthaan vanniduvin.
Mrthipaashatthinnum vidhavaa-
Suthane viduvichone naamellaaypozhum
Vishramamenye sthuthi cheythaaraadhikkenam.
Sthaumenkaalos…

items.content: Marichavare jeevippikkunnavanum kabaradakkappettavare ezhunnelpikkunnavanum nyaayaadhipathimaarude nyaayaa dhipathiyumaaya kartthaavinu sthuthi. Thante daasante shavasamskkaarashushroosha nirvahikkappedunna ee samaya tthum........ Thanne naam ortthu mahathvappedutthanam. Bkulhoon........

Aadiyil undaayirunnavanum, ippoll ullllavanum, ennennekkum nilanilkkunnavanum, thante pithaavinte mahathvatthil vishuddhamaalaakhamaarodukoode varuvaanirikkunnavanumaaya mashihaa thampuraane! Samkhyaatheethamaaya nirakallum ganangallum pathinaayirangallum thirumumpaake paribhramichu virachukondu nilkkunnu. Bhayangkaranmaaraaya kobenmaarum sthhirathayulllla ganangallum svargeeyamaaya meghangallil ninne aaghoshikkunnu. Ninte ugramaaya shabdatthil nee attahasikkumpoll maranam veenupovukayum paathaallam nashichupovukayum aadibhoothangall azhinyupovukayum, bhoomiyil dravichu chernnupoya sarvvashareerangallum punaraayi srshdikkappedukayum cheyyunnu. Sakalatthinteyum srashdaavum nirmmithaavumenna nilayil srshdishakthiyulllla vachanatthaal nee veendum avaye sajeekarikkunnu. Nanmayaakatte thinmayaakatte avanavan pravartthichittullllavayekkurichu samaadhaanam bodhippikkuvaanaayi sakalavamshangallum gothrangallum paribhramajanakavum bhayangkaravumaaya ninte simhaasanatthin mumpaake vannukoodukayum cheyyunnu. Balavaanum kaarunyavaanumaaya daivamaaya kartthaave! Ivayellaam sambhavikkukayum pravartthikkappedukayum cheyyunnathaaya aa samayatthu ninnilulllla prathyaashayode nidrapraapichirikkunna ee sahodariye ninte valatthubhaagatthu nirutthikkollllaname. "ente shareeram bhakshikkukayum ente raktham paanam cheyyukayum ennil vishvasikkukayum cheyyunna evanum ennilum nyaan avanilum vasikkunnu. Avasaanadivasatthil nyaan avane uyirtthezhunnelpikkum” ennu jeevanulllla thiruvaaykondu arullicheythittullllathaaya aa vachanam nyangallilum ivanilum niravettaname. Nyangallum nyangallude paretharum ninte valatthubhaagatthu ninnukondu ninte karunaye kaanukayum ninakkum ninte pithaavinum parishuddhaathmaavinum sthuthiyum sthothravum karettukayum cheyyumaaraaka .

content: Hosho….
(altharae damdeenoso)

Nagarakavaadam vazhiyaayu nyaan-po-ku-
Nne-ram ke-ttenoru naadam.
Shraddhichen chennarike ni-nnettam
Khedam tho-nnum ninadatthe.

Lallithakallebara tharunanmaa-reyum
Baa-lanmaa-reyum kanden.
Prabhuvanithakallum daasikallum-santaa-
Paa-raava-tthil paadunnu.

Vyasanasametham chodichen- ke-zhu-
Nne-ntinne-vam sundarare!
Vyathhayodentinu paadeedu-nne-nno-
Do-thee “moodhaa mindaathe”

Nee kaanunnoru saundaryam-paa-thaa-
Lla-tthi-l-paazhaayu poyeedum.
Ee rakthaambara ruchirathaye ee-yu-
Llllo-r than-bhooshaa subhagathaye.

Maranamashesham maayikkum-ee-sau-
Ndaryam praa-thhkaalatthil.
Thellivaakum sooryanu thulyam-ee-sau-
Nda-ryam paazhpulkkodiyinmel

Thangum thoomanyinu thulyam-ee-sau-
Nda-ryam sa-ndhyaa vellayathil.
Vaadeedum poovinu thulyam-paa-thaa-
Lla-tthil paazhaam roopatthil.

Kaniyuka kaniyuka kartthaave! Jee-van
Nal-ki the-jovasanam nee
Athine aniyicheedaname, sar-vvaa-
Dhee-shaa sthothram, sthothram-the.
Moriyo…

items.content: Balavaanum mahaakaarunyavaanum dayaaluvumaaya daivamaaya kartthaave! Thirusannidhiyilekku nee edutthirikkunnathinaal nidrapraapichirikkunna ee sahodarikku vendi ee samayatthu nyangall anachirikkunna ee dhoopam kaikkondu svargeeya yarushalemil mohaneeya vaasasthhalatthu ivalle aashvasippikkaname. Kadangallude parihaaratthinum paapangallude mochanatthinum thirumumpaakeyulllla mukhaprasannathaykkum ivalle arhayaakkukayum cheyyaname. Moraan vaalohaan ....

content: (kolo-thubaikku eettho)

Deveshaa! Nin parichaarika thannaathmatthe
Sasamaadhaanam kaikkollka
Kanmashamakhilam mochikka
Ivalle vidhikkaruthe naathhaa!
Nirmmaayan neeye-kan-thaan.
Aparaadhikallarhicheedum
Narakattheennivall rakshithayaayu
Kalpana kaatthavarodoppam
Shobhana manavara poo-kenam.
Baarekmor. Shubaho …

Haa! Mrthiye nee nyelliyendaa mrtharaa-yor-mel
Avarude mel thellilla nina-
Kkadhikaaravumavakaashamathum
Balavaanaam srashdaavavare
Vistharanam cheyyum-noo-nam.
Saakshaalavakaashikallum thal
Sutharum daasarumavarallo
Nin kaikallil ninnavare vee-
Ndekum svargamahaa-raa-jyam.
(kolo-thaihun olme)

Anchee-daa maranatthe nyaan
Nidraabheethiyumi-llennil
Daivam-theeyil nadattheedum
Vidhiyortthancheedu-nnen nyaan.
Baarekmor. Shubaho ...

Nee vaa-gdaanatthin naadaayu
Svargamahatthvam chaa-rttheedum
Soonu-dhvani jeevan nalki
Ninne valatthaayu che-rttheedum.
(madarosho-pardaiso)

Kaantanu kaatthoraam-kanyaasthreekalle nee
Praapikkum sahaje!-punaruththhaanatthil

Vyaakula lokamathen-chintaavishayamathaayu
Aadimakaalatthe-ykken maanasamodi
Srshdiyeyortthoru nyaan-vempi shaapatthaal
/tmrthyu nimittham verpiriyum naallvareyum
Naarikallathyadhikam-vyathhayil naallpokki
Vedanayodu suthare -prasavicheedunnu.

Jeevan poyppoyu ver-piriyum maathaave!
Nokkidumaathmajaril-neduveerppuyarunnu.
Thaayillaapparava-kkunyungallkkoppam
/tathisantaapatthaal rodicheedunnu
Ee deenaaraavam-kellkkunnorellaam
Khedatthaalavaro-doppam karayunnu.

Doothan chaare-va-nnennekkondiha poyu
Maarakabaanatthaal-ennil bhramametti
Nirddayapeedakallaal-marddichamgangall
/tkaanmin, vadi moonnaalenne thaadichaan
Nyaanaashrayaheena-nyaanayyo deena
Nin srshdiye naathhaa! Krpayaal puthuthaakka.
Moriyo ...
(maar baalaayiyude bovuso)

Karunaasampoornnaa! Punaruththhaanadine
Ninnude srshdiye nee-navamaakkeedenam.

Pathibandham mrthiyaal-veraayu meyu randaayu
Ttheernnoru sahajaykkaay-praarththhippin ningall
Avaronnaakaname-punaruththhaanatthil

Mochikkuka paapam-maayikkuka dosham
Sathyamezhum vidhiyin-naallil paadenam
Parishuddhanmaaro-tthivall nin sthuthi geetham.

Vannavanum varuvo-num mrthar thannuyirum
Sthuthanennu shareeraa-thmaakkall paadaname.
